ygData.subject: Re: LONG rant about what to look for in Bad group members.
ygData.msgSnippet: ... [ranger from hell with mage friend snipped] ... A while back I posted on this list that it seemed the people playing wizards on the newer servers are
ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, Jan 18/00, "Joshua R. Moore" <josh@...> wrote:
> From: "Joshua R. Moore" <josh@...>
>
> /rant on
[ranger from hell with mage friend snipped]

> Very shortly after that, I disbanded the group, after the mage said in tell
> to me "Well, I like grouping with her. I have never died before when with
> her alone. it must be you guys"

A while back I posted on this list that it seemed the people playing
wizards on the newer servers are complete idiots. Now, I have to say, at
higher levels the idiot wizards are gone, but in their place we have
idiot mages. Maybe that's where all the wizards went, I don't know, but
I'm seeing a lot of early 40's mages now on Tribunal who are probably
just starting to group for the first time in their careers, after
camping guards for 40 levels, and it is horrible to group with them.

An Enchanter friend of mine was in a group camping the Magi in Lower Guk
that was so bad she used /q to go linkdead to dump them.

--
Artificial Intelligence stands no chance against Natural Stupidity.
GAT d- -p+(--) c++++ l++ u++ t- m--- W--- !v
b+++ e* s-/+ n-(?) h++ f+g+ w+++ y*
